abstract: For the first time in several years, Joe Morgan's voice is not gracing the baseball playoffs. No matter. He could be heard loud and clear Saturday morning at the Frys.com Open.
snippet: For the first time in several years, Joe Morgan's voice is not gracing the baseball playoffs. No matter. He could be heard loud and clear Saturday morning at the Frys.com Open.
lead_paragraph: SAN MARTIN, Calif. - For the first time in several years, Joe Morgan's voice is not gracing the baseball playoffs. No matter. He could be heard loud and clear Saturday morning at the Frys.com Open.

headline.main: Morgan Talks Baseball, on a Golf Course
